Db Europe Limited

Specialists in facilities management, project management, operations management and business transformation for major 'Blue Chip' clients covering Energy (oil & gas), Banking & Insurance, Property and Telecommunications.

Our Added Value

The Managing Partners of DB Europe combine local knowledge coupled with extensive experience worldwide, often in challenging locations.

Transparency in Corporate Governance, Business Processes & Controls and excellence in the provision of support services across all fields of operations.

We are process oriented, structured and pragmatic.

DB Europe has an uncompromised approach to Health & Safety.

Scope of Services

Facilities Management

  • Operations & Maintenance
  • Site Management & Admin
  • Building integrity and legislative compliance
  • Condition Surveys
  • Space planning
  • Design and Fit-out Management
  • Transition Management
  • Financial Management
  • Service Provider(s) selection and management (Food Services, Cleaning & Janitorial, Security etc.)
  • Utilities management
  • Business Services
  • Property Management
  • Training and Succession Planning

Project Management

  • Project Planning and Execution Management
  • Stakeholder engagement
  • Design and Engineering Management
  • HSE & CDM Management
  • Detailed Scopes of Work
  • Financial Management
  • Project Reporting
  • Procurement of project services
  • Contractor Management
  • Systems Completion, Testing & Commissioning
  • Closeout Protocols and Procedures
  • Project Handover

Health & Safety

  • Regulatory Framework
  • Application of Client or DB Europe safety policies/ operating procedures
  • Strict adherence to local and international Safety Standards
  • Health & Safety Training
  • Health & Safety Auditing of Contractors and Service Providers
  • Risk Management
  • Incident Management and Reporting
  • Business Continuity Planning

Transformation Management

  • Business Transformation
  • Business Integration
  • Performance Measurement & Analysis
  • Service Delivery Improvement
  • Value Engineering and management of fragmented operational models
  • Financial Planning
  • Vendor Procurement
  • Policy Setting
  • Cultivation of profitable internal and external business alliances
  • Stakeholder engagement
  • Team Building
  • Communication Strategies

Contracts Management

  • Procurement and Contracting strategies
  • Scopes of Works and tender processes
  • Business processes and controls
  • Service deliverables; SLA / KPI
  • Change Order processes
  • Commercial negotiations
  • Financial Management

About Us

Bill Flint

Managing Partner

Operations, Projects and Business Management expert specialising in large scale operations in challenging environments worldwide. Managed major projects in Europe, Middle East, Africa and Far East. Provided specialist Interim Management support to companies undergoing transformation.


Dorota Flint

Managing Partner

Widely experienced in all aspects of facility, property and asset portfolio management, ranging from A-class large multi-tenanted offices and business parks in developed countries to regional corporate headquarters, exclusive residential compounds, leisure and hospitality facilities in challenging locations worldwide (Africa, Far East, Asia Pacific). Specialising in start-up to project handover, transition and change management. Contracts Management and Business Processes and Controls.
